verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5197>drop<s%> your word <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4720>holy<s%> places, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, and will <S%H3318>draw<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

<S%H3282>Seeing<s%> then that I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> therefore shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north:<s%>

That <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H3318>drawn<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath:<s%> it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

<S%H584>Sigh<s%> therefore, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> with the <S%H7670>breaking<s%> of your <S%H4975>loins;<s%> and with <S%H4814>bitterness<s%> <S%H584>sigh<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H5981>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H584>sigh<s%> you? that you shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> For the <S%H8052>tidings;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H935>comes:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3543>faint,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it <S%H935>comes,<s%> and shall be <S%H1961>brought<s%> to pass, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H559>Say,<s%> A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4803>furbished:<s%>

It is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> to make a sore <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished<s%> that it may <S%H1300>glitter:<s%> should we <S%H176>then<s%> make <S%H7797>mirth?<s%> it <S%H3988>scorns<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H1121>son,<s%> as <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

And he has <S%H5414>given<s%> it to be <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> that it may be <S%H8610>handled:<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> and it is <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>slayer.<s%>

<S%H2199>Cry<s%> and <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man:<s%> for it shall be on my <S%H5971>people,<s%> it shall be on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H4048>terrors<s%> by <S%H413>reason<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be on my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H5606>smite<s%> therefore on your <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> it is a <S%H974>trial,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the sword <S%H3988>scorn<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H7626>rod?<s%> it shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

You therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%> together. and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> time, the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain:<s%> it is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men that are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> which enters into their <S%H2314>privy<s%> <S%H2315>chambers.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H19>point<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that their <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H4127>faint,<s%> and their <S%H4383>ruins<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied:<s%> <S%H253>ah!<s%> it is made <S%H1300>bright,<s%> it is <S%H4593>wrapped<s%> up for the <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>
<S%H258>Go<s%> you one way or other, either on the <S%H3231>right<s%> <S%H3231>hand,<s%> or on the <S%H8041>left,<s%> <S%H575>wherever<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H3259>set.<s%>
I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> together, and I will cause my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest:<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>said<s%> it.
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me again, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Also, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>appoint<s%> you <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> may <S%H935>come:<s%> both <S%H8147>two<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H1254>choose<s%> you a <S%H3027>place,<s%> <S%H1254>choose<s%> it at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H7760>Appoint<s%> a <S%H1870>way,<s%> that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7237>Rabbath<s%> of the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5984><s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H1219>defended.<s%>

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination:<s%> he made his <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7043>bright,<s%> he <S%H7592>consulted<s%> with <S%H8655>images,<s%> he <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H3516>liver.<s%>

At his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> was the <S%H7081>divination<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> <S%H3733>captains,<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H7524>slaughter,<s%> to <S%H7311>lift<s%> up the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> to <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount,<s%> and to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort.<s%>

And it shall be to them as a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> to them that have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths:<s%> but he will <S%H2142>call<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> that they may be <S%H8610>taken.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> so that in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>doings<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> do <S%H7200>appear;<s%> <S%H3282>because,<s%> I say, that you are come to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> you shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the <S%H3079>hand.<s%>

And you, <S%H2491>profane<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>diadem,<s%> and <S%H7311>take<s%> off the <S%H5850>crown:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> shall not be the <S%H2063>same:<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> him that is <S%H8217>low,<s%> and <S%H8213>abase<s%> him that is <S%H1364>high.<s%>

I will <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> it: and it shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> it is; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it him.

And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5984><s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> even <S%H559>say<s%> you, The <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn:<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> to <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of the <S%H1300>glittering:<s%>

Whiles they <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> to you, whiles they <S%H7080>divine<s%> a <S%H3576>lie<s%> to you, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> you on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end.<s%>

Shall I cause it to <S%H7725>return<s%> into his <S%H8593>sheath?<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4351>nativity.<s%>

And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on you, I will <S%H6315>blow<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1197>brutish<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H2796>skillful<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy.<s%>

You shall be for <S%H402>fuel<s%> to the <S%H784>fire;<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> you shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H2142>remembered:<s%> for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
